id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.  Required if you have multiple busses.

*See also: [OpenTherm](https://esphome.io/components/opentherm.html#configuration-variables)*

in_pin.docs:
**number**: The pin of the OpenTherm hardware bridge which is usually labeled `out` on the board.

*See also: [OpenTherm](https://esphome.io/components/opentherm.html#configuration-variables)*

out_pin.docs:
**number**: The pin of the OpenTherm hardware bridge which is usually labeled `in` on the board.

*See also: [OpenTherm](https://esphome.io/components/opentherm.html#configuration-variables)*
